Articles.Content:
I started a new career today and noticed that you can only build a ship that weighs 18.0 tons in the beginning. Fair enough. I did some missions to get some Kerbucks, upgraded buildings, etc. but noticed that I can still only build ships that weigh a total of 18.0 tons; however the parts I can add increase from 30 to 255.

It just seems strange. I don't mind it one bit because it makes the game more challenging, but it's a little annoying in the same breath because you'd think that adding more parts means you'd be able to build heavier ships to take you further distances.

Is there a way to increase the mass of ships? Or is 18.0 tons the total weight you can build even once the buildings are fully upgraded?
Your just got some things mixed up. The 30 to 255 is the total part limit you may have, and is upgraded via the VAB. However to increase the mass limit you must upgrade the launch pad.

I did not even know that was upgradable. I shall move along, lol.

Thanks!!!!!
